message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $70 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $82?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm trying to stay within a tight budget, and $82 is still a bit out of my range.
I understand that $75 is still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $79?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. I'm willing to make a small sacrifice to get the product, but I don't want to go over my budget.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $79.5, but that's as low as I can go.
